summary: 检测宏景HCM attestation模块是否存在SQL注入漏洞，通过发送特定的POST请求并分析响应时间及状态码来判断漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: Detect whether there is an SQL injection vulnerability in the attestation module of Hongjing HCM. Determine the existence of vulnerabilities by sending specific POST requests and analyzing response times and status codes.
